tag_list: derickdowns, derek-downs, derrick-downs, bidslist, msp-usa, merchant-service-provider, merchant-services, sony
overview:
Derick Downs has been labeled as the Top Budding Entrepreneur under 30 from San Diego

Derick Downs is the CEO of BidsList. A broker for any type of Service Related project. BidsList brokers a variety of types of service. From Residential & Commercial construction, all the way to all types of Online Services. BidsList acts as a neutral 3rd party to help facilitate all aspects of your project. Derick Downs created BidsList in order to provide peace of mind to all parties involved in a project.

Derick Downs is a Financial Executive with broad experience in all aspects of Financial Management, Risk Management, Website Development, Project Management, and Business Consulting

Derick has created what will soon be one of the biggest online platforms in the world. It will completely change the service industry forever. The website is www.BidsList.com. It should be going into a beta phase in 2012.

Creator of a website called www.ddgig.com. This is a website where you can tell people what you are willing to do for money. Example: I will do (you name it) for $( you name price).

Creator of Wine Diego / Dine Diego

Before Derick Downs can speak intelligently about the services that might be appropriate for you, your family, or your business, he needs to get to know you. Before you can feel comfortable sharing your goals and dreams, you need to get to know Derick.

Networking, Public Speaking, Marketing, Sales, Websites, Outsourcing, Motivational Speaking, SEO, PPC, Online Marketing, Project Management, Organization, Leadership, Communication Skills, Ability to think outside the box
